headline: Cboe Global Markets Stock: Is CBOE Outperforming the Financial Sector?
summary: Although Cboe Global Markets has outperformed its sector peers recently, analysts remain cautious about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Fifth XRP Spot ETF on the Way After CBOE Approval of 21Shares Application
summary: Once live, the ETF will track the CME CF XRP-Dollar Reference Rate (New York Variant), giving investors exposure to XRP via a regulated fund structure without handling the asset directly.

raw.headline: Fifth XRP Spot ETF on the Way After CBOE Approval of 21Shares Application
raw.summary: Once live, the ETF will track the CME CF XRP-Dollar Reference Rate (New York Variant), giving investors exposure to XRP via a regulated fund structure without handling the asset directly.

headline: OSB GROUP PLC - Transaction in Own Shares
summary: OSB GROUP PLC ISIN: GB00BLDRH36011 December 2025 LEI number: 213800ZBKL9BHSL2K459 OSB GROUP PLC (the “Company”) Transaction in Own Shares The Company announces that on 10 December 2025 it had purchased a total of 69,284 of its ordinary shares of £0.01 each (the "ordinary shares") on the London Stock Exchange, CBOE BXE and CBOE CXE, through the Company's broker Citigroup Global Markets Limited as detailed below. The repurchased ordinary shares will be cancelled. London Stock ExchangeCBOE BXECBOE
